ygData.subject: Re: Medium Bronze Armor (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can get it from normal ice goblins, it s just a lot rarer I d guess something like 1 in 500 drops it.  When my friends and I were L20-27 and fighting
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Sep 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> My understanding was that the only mobs in Perma that dropped bronze
> were the elite guards at the back by the diplomat. At L19 I would have
> thought that they might be a bit hard to reach, even with a full party.
> Is this not the case? This dungeon wasn't even itemized until I was in
> my 30's so I didn't get to play there much except for a trip to pick up
> a crystalline blade and a couple of aborted Vox attempts.

You can get it from normal ice goblins, it's just a lot rarer
I'd guess something like 1 in 500 drops it. When my friends
and I were L20-27 and fighting the ice gobbies, we'd average
one piece of medium bronze every other night.

It's a shame that Verant made it so difficult to get. By the
time we were capable of handling the goblin elites (they are
*all* linked so you have to be much higher than they con to
tackle them), most of my medium-sized friends had saved up
enough plat to buy medium steel plate.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
